subject: Re: Waterproof Ghost Box  - for investigations in the rain or a wet area
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Another Great Video Mike, i wonder if all Sony radios work that way.  
A while back i used my Sony Walkman the same way, but i used a 
clothes pin to hold the button down.  That was model #SRF-M37V if 
anyone is interested, that model is available at most electronic 
store chains.  So, how's the 470 hack coming???  I was thinking of 
giving that model another shot, but my local radio shack was out of 
stock yesterday.

-Steve H.
